channel.title: Amazon Web Services on VR
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon Web Services on VR

item.title: AWS Basics
item.description: AWS IAM An AWS account is created with a root account which has admin privileges. IAM Group : is a collection of users who perform similar jobs on aws . IAM Policies can be attached to group IAM Policy: Provides permission to user to carry out allowed actions can be Job Function or Aws Managed or Customer Managed IAM Role : Allows aws services to securely access different services.
